summary:
**Need for Speed (NFS)** is a popular racing game series made by Electronic Arts. It started in 1994 and is still going strong, with the latest game, *Need for Speed Unbound*, released in 2022. The games are about illegal street racing and outrunning the police.

Many different teams have made NFS games, and some have been very successful. The franchise has sold over 150 million copies and has even inspired a movie and Hot Wheels toys.
title: Need for Speed
